metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6334 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in theParser::replaceInternalLinks2 method in MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.xbefore 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving replacement of percentencoding in unclosed internal links.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6334` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
